Pre-Game Insights: India have won 3 games and lost 2 in their last 5 games.
Sri Lanka have won 3 games and lost 2 in their last 5 games.
Both teams last played against each other in the Match 33 of the ICC Cricket World Cup, 2023.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo is a balanced pitch.
The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 218 runs.
There is light rain expected which may affect playing conditions.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
Others: India Squad: Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, KL Rahul, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Shreyas Iyer, Rishabh Pant, Mohammed Siraj, Washington Sundar, Khaleel Ahmed, Shivam Dube, Shubman Gill, Riyan Parag, Arshdeep Singh and Harshit Rana

Sri Lanka Squad: Akila Dananjaya, Kusal Mendis, Chamika Karunaratne, Sadeera Samarawickrama, Wanindu Hasaranga, Asitha Fernando, Avishka Fernando, Kamindu Mendis, Charith Asalanka, Janith Liyanage, Pathum Nissanka, Mohamed Shiraz, Nishan Madushka, Maheesh Theekshana, Dunith Wellalage and Eshan Malinga
